DOC.brief_summary: The effect coadministration oral propranolol oxytocin induction labor .
DOC.brief_title: The Effect Coadministration Oral Propranolol Oxytocin Induction Labor
DOC.detailed_description: Study hypothesis : Oral propranolol use oxytocin process labor may reduce labor interval decrease rate cesarean delivery . Study population : The patient recruit woman attend obstetrics reception room , Ain Shams University Maternity Hospital . Intervention : After take informed consent , patient recruit study undergo complete clinical examination detail medical history obtain along necessary laboratory investigation ultrasound . Each patient case record form follow data record : 1 . History : personal ( age , duration marriage ) , present illness ( current medical surgical disease current medication ) , obstetric history ( include parity , gestational age , obstetric complication ) past medical history ( especially cardiac problem ) . 2 . Clinical examination : 1 . General examination : assessment vital data , cardiac chest auscultation exclude contraindication drug administration . 2 . Abdominal examination : assessment fundal level contraction present . 3 . Pelvic examination : assessment Bishop score , membrane status fetal presentation . 3 . Investigations : 1 . Routine investigation do e.g. , Full blood count , CRP titre . 2 . Pelvi-abdominal U/S ( confirm fetal life , placental location , fetus parameter , amniotic fluid index , expect fetal weight ) . Steps : 1 . Informed consent obtain parent guardian patient invited participate research explanation benefit risk trial . 2 . A capsule contain 20 mg propranolol first group ( propranolol plus oxytocin ) similar capsule placebo second group ( oxytocin plus placebo ) administrate orally begin induction . Oral capsule repeat 8 h , three forceful contraction obtain 10 min . 3 . Induction initiate dose 2 mIu/min increase 2 mIu/min every 15 min three forceful contraction obtain 10 min , maximum dose 30 mIu/min . Then , continue rate 8 h. If patient enter active phase labor ( cervical dilatation = 3-4 cm ) , induction continue delivery . 4 . Amniotomy perform cervical dilation reach 5 cm , membrane rupture spontaneously . 5 . The partogram use monitor fetal heart rate , membrane status , cervical dilation effacement , station fetus , uterine contraction , maternal pulse , maternal blood pressure , maternal temperature . 6 . If response induction second day , cesarean section perform . 7 . The participant follow delivery . Safety Considerations : If parturient hyperstimulation contraction ( situation 5 contractions/10 min , duration contraction > 90 sec , interval contraction le 2 min , fetal distress ) , induction stop , parturient kept leave lateral position give oxygen , intravenous dextrose .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Gestational age 37 week . 2 . Fetal life positive ultrasound . 3 . Bishop score > 5 . 4 . Primiparous woman . 1. history uterine surgery 2. polyhydramnios 3. contraindication Î²adrenergic agent , systolic blood pressure le 100 mmHg pulse rate le 60/min 120/min 4. history know cardiac disease 5. mother 's pulmonary metabolic disorder 6. fetal distress 7. estimate weight fetus 4 kg ultrasound cephalic presentation
